description: Miyako has an energetic personality and enjoys doing unorthodox things. Initially appears chasing after a purse thief, borrowing Hiro`s bicycle. She eventually starts to become attracted to Hiro after they start spending more time together, but during this time Hiro`s childhood friend Kei Shindo begins to feel left out and a love triangle develops between the three students.
name: Miyamura Miyako
